welcomeMessage:
Benvenuto su GoofCord!
Cambia le impostazioni a tuo piacimento e, una volta fatto, chiudi la finestra per accedere a Discord.
Buona permanenza!
settings-encryption-unavailable: GoofCord non ha potuto individuare alcun password manager. Le impostazioni crittogradate verranno conservate su un file di testo semplice. Se sei su Linux installa gnome-libsecret o kwallet
opt-locale-desc: This is different from Discord's language. You can translate GoofCord here.
opt-discordUrl-desc: URL che GoofCord caricher√† all'avvio. Aggiungi "canary." o "ptb." prima di "discord.com" per le relative istanze.
opt-arrpc-desc: Abilita un'implementazione Open Source della Rich Presence chiamata arRPC. √à necessaria una soluzione alternativa per far funzionare arRPC tramite Flatpak
opt-minimizeToTray-desc: GoofCord rimane aperto anche chiudendo tutte le relative finestre.
opt-launchWithOsBoot-desc: Avvia GoofCord automaticamente all'avvio del sistema. Potrebbe non funzionare in alcuni ambienti Linux.
opt-spellcheck-desc: Attiva il correttore automatico per i campi testuali.
opt-updateNotification-desc: Ricevi notifiche al rilascio di nuove versioni.
opt-customTitlebar-desc: Abilita una titlebar con uno stile simile a Discord.
opt-disableAltMenu-desc: Impedisci al pulsante Alt di aprire il Menu delle Applicazioni.
opt-dynamicIcon-desc: Shows pings/mentions count on GoofCord's icon and its tray. On Linux, pings on the taskbar only work when unitylib is installed.
opt-customIconPath-desc: Seleziona un'icona personalizzata per GoofCord. √à consigliabile inserire un'immagine con sfondo trasparente.
opt-trayIcon-desc: What tray icon to use. Symbolic attempts to mimic Gnome's monochromatic icons.
opt-autoscroll-desc: Abilita l'auto-scrolling col pulsante centrale del mouse.
opt-popoutWindowAlwaysOnTop: Pop out window always on top
opt-popoutWindowAlwaysOnTop-desc: Makes voice chat pop out window always stay above other windows.
opt-transparency-desc: Abilita la trasparenza per i temi che supportano effetti traslucidi.
opt-modNames-desc: What client mods to use. You shouldn't disable Shelter as it is used by many GoofCord features. Do not mix forks of the same mod (e.g. Vencord and Equicord). Client mod I want to use is not listed.
opt-customCssBundle-desc: A raw link to the JS bundle and CSS bundle of a client mod you want to use.
opt-invidiousEmbeds-desc: Replaces YouTube embeds with Invidious embeds. You can customize the instance from Shelter's settings.
opt-encryptionPasswords-desc: Securely stored, encrypted list of passwords that will be used for encryption. A backup in a warm, safe place is recommended. Separate entries with commas.
opt-encryptionCover-desc: A message that a user without the password will see. At least two words or empty.
opt-encryptionMark-desc: A string that will be prepended to each decrypted message so it's easier to know what messages are encrypted.
opt-domOptimizer-desc: Defers DOM updates to possibly improve performance. May cause visual artifacts.
opt-renderingOptimizations-desc: Applies CSS optimizations to improve scrolling smoothness. May cause text to become blurry if used with some themes.
opt-forceDedicatedGPU-desc: Forces GoofCord to use a dedicated GPU if available.
opt-performanceFlags-desc: Enables additional Chromium flags for performance. Recommended ON unless causes issues.
opt-blocklist-desc: Lista degli URL bloccati. Separa gli elementi con delle virgole.
opt-blockedStrings-desc: If any of specified strings are in the URL, it will be blocked.
opt-allowedStrings-desc: If any of specified strings are in the URL, it will *not* be blocked.
opt-autoSaveCloud-desc: Automatically save settings to cloud when they change.
opt-cloudHost-desc: GoofCord Cloud Server URL. You can self-host it yourself, see the repository.
opt-cloudEncryptionKey-desc: Leave empty to not use encryption and not save message encryption passwords on cloud. You can't recover your password if you lose it.
